io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common

Interface RequestMetricsCollector


  • @ProviderType
public interface RequestMetricsCollector
    Keeps track of all upstream resource that have been fetched while handling the current-request, and collects additional data for performance analyze and caching.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RequestMetricsCollector create()
      Create a new instance to collect performance data for the current incoming request
      io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResource createMetadataResource(io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource resourceImpl)
      Create a resource with performance analysis data that can be embedded in the response
      Integer getResponseMaxAge()
      Calculates the "max-age" Cache-Control header value to be used when rendering the response.
      void onMethodInvocationFinished(Class category, String methodDescription, long invocationDurationMicros)
      Internal method called by the framework to measure execution times of specific request processing stages
      void onResponseRetrieved(String resourceUri, String resourceTitle, Integer maxAgeSeconds, long responseTimeMicros)
      Internal method called by the framework whenever an upstream resource has been retrieved
      void setResponseMaxAge(Duration duration)
      Set the upper limit for the max-age header of the response to the current incoming request.

    • Method Detail

      • getResponseMaxAge

        Integer getResponseMaxAge()
        Calculates the "max-age" Cache-Control header value to be used when rendering the response.
        Returns:
        the minimum "max-age" value of all upstream requests and the limit set via setResponseMaxAge(Duration)

      • setResponseMaxAge

        void setResponseMaxAge(Duration duration)
        Set the upper limit for the max-age header of the response to the current incoming request.
        Parameters:
        duration - the maximum cache duration

      • createMetadataResource

        io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResource createMetadataResource(io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource resourceImpl)
        Create a resource with performance analysis data that can be embedded in the response
        Parameters:
        resourceImpl - the main resource being rendered in the current request
        Returns:
        a HalResource with detailed performance information for the current request

      • onResponseRetrieved

        void onResponseRetrieved(String resourceUri,
                         String resourceTitle,
                         Integer maxAgeSeconds,
                         long responseTimeMicros)
        Internal method called by the framework whenever an upstream resource has been retrieved
        Parameters:
        resourceUri - the URI of the resource that has been retrieved
        resourceTitle - the title of the resource that has been retrieved
        maxAgeSeconds - the value of the "max-age" header (or null if not available)
        responseTimeMicros - the time in microseconds between initiating the request and finishing parsing the response

      • onMethodInvocationFinished

        void onMethodInvocationFinished(Class category,
                                String methodDescription,
                                long invocationDurationMicros)
        Internal method called by the framework to measure execution times of specific request processing stages
        Parameters:
        category - a class used to group measurements
        methodDescription - describes what task was executed
        invocationDurationMicros - the time in microseconds used to execute that task

      • create

        static RequestMetricsCollector create()
        Create a new instance to collect performance data for the current incoming request
        Returns:
        a new instance of RequestMetricsCollector
